params.name: subscriptionId
params.doc:
ID of the subscription for which the charge limit has been updated.
To track usage and billing for apps, we recommend to use `instanceId` instead
of the `subscriptionId`.

params.name: currency
params.doc:
Supported values: `AUD`, `BRL`, `CAD`, `EUR`, `GBP`, `ILS`, `INR`, `JPY`, `MXN`, `PLN`, `RUB`, `TRY`, `USD`.

3-letter currency code in
[ISO-4217 alphabetic](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217#Active_codes)
format of the charges. Wix may add supported currencies in the future.

docs.summary:
Triggered in case the charge limit for an instance of your app is updated.


You can't update the charge limit after you've set an initial
value. Site owners can increase the limit in their site's dashboard,
currently they aren't allowed to decrease it.

examples.title: Get notified when a customer updates the charge limit.

extra.description: The data payload includes the following object as an encoded JWT. Here, we show the request and response objects decoded.

params.name: subscriptionId
params.doc:
ID of the subscription for which Wix hasn't accepted your custom charges.
To track usage and billing for apps, we recommend to use `instanceId` instead
of the `subscriptionId`.

params.name: currency
params.doc:
Supported values: `AUD`, `BRL`, `CAD`, `EUR`, `GBP`, `ILS`, `INR`, `JPY`, `MXN`, `PLN`, `RUB`, `TRY`, `USD`.

3-letter currency code in
[ISO-4217 alphabetic](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217#Active_codes)
format of the charges. Wix may add supported currencies in the future.

params.name: chargeIds
params.doc:
IDs of the rejected charges.

Max: 5 charges

params.name: chargeLimit
params.doc:
Maximum amount that your app may charge the customer per billing cycle.

Min: `0.50`

params.name: reasons
params.doc:
Information about why Wix has rejected your app's charges.

+ `"UNKNOWN_REASON"`: There is no information about why Wix has rejected the charges. 
+ `"CHARGE_LIMIT_EXCEEDED"`: The sum of the charges is higher than the limit that you may charge the customer per billing cycle.
+ `"TOO_MANY_CHARGES"`: You can't provide more than 5 charges per invoice.
+ `"INVALID_FORMAT"`: You must submit charges as whole numbers or use a dot to separate major and minor units. For example, `10` or `1.50`. Currently, Wix doesn't validate whether the submitted number of decimals for the minor unit is supported for the given currency.

Max: 20 reasons

docs.summary:
Triggered in case Wix doesn't accept the charges you've returned in the 
[List Charges](https://dev.wix.com/docs/rest/api-reference/app-management/apps/custom-charges-spi/custom-charges-provider-v1/list-charges)
endpoint.


You aren't allowed to charge a site owner more than the charge limit. Wix
call List Charges in regular intervals until the sum of all charges is lower than the
charge limit. Wix doesn't create an invoice in case the charges aren't accepted.

examples.title: Get notified when Wix doesn't accept your custom charges.

extra.description: The data payload includes the following object as an encoded JWT. Here, we show the request and response objects decoded.

params.name: subscriptionId
params.doc:
ID of the subscription for which Wix retrieves the charge limit. Equals
`null` in case Wix hasn't created the subscription when retrieving an
initial charge limit. To track usage and billing for apps, we recommend to
use `instanceId` instead of the `subscriptionId`.

params.name: currency
params.doc:
Supported values: `AUD`, `BRL`, `CAD`, `EUR`, `GBP`, `ILS`, `INR`, `JPY`, `MXN`, `PLN`, `RUB`, `TRY`, `USD`.

3-letter currency code in
[ISO-4217 alphabetic](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217#Active_codes)
format of the charge limit. Wix may add supported currencies in the future.

docs.summary:
Wix calls this endpoint to retrieve the initial charge limit for a paid instance
of your app. This happens every time a customer is upgrading to a paid version of
your app. 

You can't update the charge limit after you've set an initial
value. Customers can increase the limit in their site's dashboard, currently they
aren't allowed to decrease it.

examples.title: Return an app instance's initial charge limit.

extra.description: The data payload includes the following object as an encoded JWT. Here, we show the request and response objects decoded.

params.name: subscriptionId
params.doc:
ID of the subscription for which Wix has created an invoice that includes
your custom charges. To track usage and billing for apps, we recommend to use
`instanceId` instead of the `subscriptionId`.

params.name: currency
params.doc:
Supported values: `AUD`, `BRL`, `CAD`, `EUR`, `GBP`, `ILS`, `INR`, `JPY`, `MXN`, `PLN`, `RUB`, `TRY`, `USD`.

3-letter currency code in
[ISO-4217 alphabetic](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217#Active_codes)
format of the charges. Wix may add supported currencies in the future.

params.name: lineItems
params.doc: Line items included in the invoice.

docs.summary:
Triggered in case Wix creates an invoice that includes charges for an instance
of your app.

examples.title: Get notified when Wix creates an invoice with your custom charges.

extra.description: The data payload includes the following object as an encoded JWT. Here, we show the request and response objects decoded.

params.name: subscriptionId
params.doc:
ID of the subscription for which Wix retrieves your custom charges.
To track usage and billing for apps, we recommend to use `instanceId` instead
of the `subscriptionId`.

params.name: currency
params.doc:
Supported values: `AUD`, `BRL`, `CAD`, `EUR`, `GBP`, `ILS`, `INR`, `JPY`, `MXN`, `PLN`, `RUB`, `TRY`, `USD`.

3-letter currency code in
[ISO-4217 alphabetic](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217#Active_codes)
format of your charges to return. Wix may add supported currencies in the future.

params.name: periodStart
params.doc:
Begin of the period Wix retrieves the app instance's charges for in
`YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssZ` format.

params.name: periodEnd
params.doc:
End of the period Wix retrieves the app instance's charges for in
`YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssZ` format.

params.name: intent
params.doc:
Information about what Wix intends to do with the retrieved charges.

+ `"DISPLAY_ONLY"`: Inform the customer about how much your app would charge them at the moment. Wix doesn't create an invoice.
+ `"CREATE_INVOICE"`: Create an invoice for the customer.

docs.summary:
Wix calls this endpoint to retrieve a list of charges for a paid instance
of your app. This happens when Wix creates an invoice or in case the customer
wants to preview how much your app would charge them at the moment. 

You must return the charges in the currency that's specified in the request,
you aren't allowed to return more than 5 charges, and their sum must be lower
than the charge limit.

You may not bill customers for any usage that didn’t occur during the period
Wix specifies when retrieving the charges. If Wix discovers that your app has
charged customers for usage outside of an invoice's specified period, we may
take action such as blocking your app from charging the customer, removing
your app from the Wix App Market, revoking your access to the Wix developer
program, or pursuing legal action to recover damages caused by overcharging.
We understand that mistakes can happen and encourage you to contact
[the Wix App Market team](https://devforum.wix.com/kb/en/contact) immediately if you
become aware of any overcharging issues so that we can work together to
resolve the situation.

examples.title: Return your app's custom charges.

extra.description: The data payload includes the following object as an encoded JWT. Here, we show the request and response objects decoded.

members.name: subscriptionId
members.doc:
ID of the subscription for which Wix retrieves the charge limit. Equals
`null` in case Wix hasn't created the subscription when retrieving an
initial charge limit. To track usage and billing for apps, we recommend to
use `instanceId` instead of the `subscriptionId`.

members.name: currency
members.doc:
Supported values: `AUD`, `BRL`, `CAD`, `EUR`, `GBP`, `ILS`, `INR`, `JPY`, `MXN`, `PLN`, `RUB`, `TRY`, `USD`.

3-letter currency code in
[ISO-4217 alphabetic](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217#Active_codes)
format of the charge limit. Wix may add supported currencies in the future.

members.name: chargeLimit
members.doc:
Retrieved charge limit for the app instance. You can't update the
charge limit after you've set an initial value. Site owners can increase the
limit in their site's dashboard, currently they aren't allowed to decrease it.

members.name: subscriptionId
members.doc:
ID of the subscription for which Wix retrieves your custom charges.
To track usage and billing for apps, we recommend to use `instanceId` instead
of the `subscriptionId`.

members.name: currency
members.doc:
Supported values: `AUD`, `BRL`, `CAD`, `EUR`, `GBP`, `ILS`, `INR`, `JPY`, `MXN`, `PLN`, `RUB`, `TRY`, `USD`.

3-letter currency code in
[ISO-4217 alphabetic](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217#Active_codes)
format of your charges to return. Wix may add supported currencies in the future.

members.name: periodStart
members.doc:
Begin of the period Wix retrieves the app instance's charges for in
`YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssZ` format.

members.name: periodEnd
members.doc:
End of the period Wix retrieves the app instance's charges for in
`YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssZ` format.

members.name: intent
members.doc:
Information about what Wix intends to do with the retrieved charges.

+ `"DISPLAY_ONLY"`: Inform the customer about how much your app would charge them at the moment. Wix doesn't create an invoice.
+ `"CREATE_INVOICE"`: Create an invoice for the customer.

members.name: charges
members.doc:
Retrieved charges.

Max: 5 charges

members.name: id
members.doc:
ID of the charge. Make sure to save the charge ID on your servers for future
reference. Identical to `lineItem.chargeId` in the
[Invoice Created Event](https://dev.wix.com/docs/rest/api-reference/app-management/apps/custom-charges-spi/custom-charges-provider-v1/invoice-created-event).

Max: 64 characters

members.name: description
members.doc: Charge description.

members.name: amount
members.doc:
Charge amount in the currency that's specified in the request. Use a whole number
or separate major and minor units with a dot. For example, `10` or `1.99`. Currently,
Wix doesn't validate whether the submitted number of decimals for the minor unit is
supported for the given currency.

Min: `0.50`

members.name: subscriptionId
members.doc:
ID of the subscription for which Wix hasn't accepted your custom charges.
To track usage and billing for apps, we recommend to use `instanceId` instead
of the `subscriptionId`.

members.name: currency
members.doc:
Supported values: `AUD`, `BRL`, `CAD`, `EUR`, `GBP`, `ILS`, `INR`, `JPY`, `MXN`, `PLN`, `RUB`, `TRY`, `USD`.

3-letter currency code in
[ISO-4217 alphabetic](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217#Active_codes)
format of the charges. Wix may add supported currencies in the future.

members.name: chargeIds
members.doc:
IDs of the rejected charges.

Max: 5 charges

members.name: chargeLimit
members.doc:
Maximum amount that your app may charge the customer per billing cycle.

Min: `0.50`

members.name: reasons
members.doc:
Information about why Wix has rejected your app's charges.

+ `"UNKNOWN_REASON"`: There is no information about why Wix has rejected the charges. 
+ `"CHARGE_LIMIT_EXCEEDED"`: The sum of the charges is higher than the limit that you may charge the customer per billing cycle.
+ `"TOO_MANY_CHARGES"`: You can't provide more than 5 charges per invoice.
+ `"INVALID_FORMAT"`: You must submit charges as whole numbers or use a dot to separate major and minor units. For example, `10` or `1.50`. Currently, Wix doesn't validate whether the submitted number of decimals for the minor unit is supported for the given currency.

Max: 20 reasons

members.name: subscriptionId
members.doc:
ID of the subscription for which Wix has created an invoice that includes
your custom charges. To track usage and billing for apps, we recommend to use
`instanceId` instead of the `subscriptionId`.

members.name: currency
members.doc:
Supported values: `AUD`, `BRL`, `CAD`, `EUR`, `GBP`, `ILS`, `INR`, `JPY`, `MXN`, `PLN`, `RUB`, `TRY`, `USD`.

3-letter currency code in
[ISO-4217 alphabetic](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217#Active_codes)
format of the charges. Wix may add supported currencies in the future.

members.name: invoiceId
members.doc: ID of the created invoice.

members.name: lineItems
members.doc: Line items included in the invoice.

members.name: chargeId
members.doc:
ID of the charge as returned in
[List Charges](https://dev.wix.com/docs/rest/api-reference/app-management/apps/custom-charges-spi/custom-charges-provider-v1/list-charges).

Max: 64 characters

members.name: amount
members.doc: Charge amount.

members.name: id
members.doc: ID of the line item in the invoice that Wix sends to the customer.

members.name: subscriptionId
members.doc:
ID of the subscription for which the charge limit has been updated.
To track usage and billing for apps, we recommend to use `instanceId` instead
of the `subscriptionId`.

members.name: currency
members.doc:
Supported values: `AUD`, `BRL`, `CAD`, `EUR`, `GBP`, `ILS`, `INR`, `JPY`, `MXN`, `PLN`, `RUB`, `TRY`, `USD`.

3-letter currency code in
[ISO-4217 alphabetic](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217#Active_codes)
format of the charges. Wix may add supported currencies in the future.

members.name: chargeLimit
members.doc: Updated charge limit.

docs.summary:
Possible values are:
  • DISPLAY_ONLY - retrieving the current charges for display purposes only
  • CREATE_INVOICE - retrieving the current charges with the intention of creating an invoice and billing the user

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • CHARGE_LIMIT_EXCEEDED
  • TOO_MANY_CHARGES
  • INVALID_FORMAT
